Actions.Name: Add watermark
Actions.Description: This action adds a watermark to a PDF.

Actions.Name: Create a PDF
Actions.Description: This action creates a PDF file with JSON data and your template.

Actions.Name: Create editor session
Actions.Description: This action creates a new PDF editor session. The PDF editor url can be embedded into an IFrame.

Actions.Name: Create a PDF from multiple templates
Actions.Description: This action creates a PDF file from multiple templates. It merges all the PDFs into one.

Actions.Name: Get account info
Actions.Description: This action returns the account information.

Actions.Name: List templates
Actions.Description: This action lists all your PDF templates.

Actions.Name: List transactions
Actions.Description: This action lists all the transactions.

Actions.Name: Merge PDFs
Actions.Description: This action merges multiple PDF URLs.

Actions.Name: Create a new template
Actions.Description: This action creates a new template from a template ID.

Actions.Name: Update template
Actions.Description: This action updates the specified PDF template.
